search_term_for_timer.description: Either the duration or the label of the timer.

updated_timer_duration.description: New duration that the timer should be updated to.

additional_time_for_timer.description: The duration to add to the current timer.

updated_timer_name.description: The new label to be updated to.

modify_all_timers_at_once.description: Whether to perform a bulk operation on all timers.

name: change_alarm_properties
description: Modifies when alarm(s) should go off.

search_term_for_alarm.description: Alarm's time of day or label.

target_alarm_state.description: Type of the alarm to be modified.

updated_alarm_time.description: The new time of the day.

updated_time_period.description: One of AM, PM or UNKNOWN.

updated_alarm_name.description: The new label to be updated to.

additional_time_for_alarm.description: The duration to add to the current alarm.

existing_alarm_date.description: The alarm with the date that should modify for.

revised_alarm_date.description: The new date that the alarm should be updated to.

modify_all_alarms_at_once.description: Whether to perform a bulk operation on all alarms.

name: configure_new_timer
description:
Create a new timer.

This method can:
1) Create a timer with a given duration. (For example, set a timer for 10 minutes.)
2) Create a timer for a specific time. (For example, set a timer to go off at 10:30.)

timer_countdown_duration.description: Duration of the timer, in the format such as e.g. 5h30m20s, 10m, 2m15s, etc.

timer_end_time.description: Time of the day that the timer should fire, in 12-hour format "H[:M[:S]]".

timer_custom_label.description: Label of the timer, if meaningful.

name: delay_active_alarm
description: Snoozes an alarm that has fired.

postponement_interval.description: Duration to snooze the alarm in seconds.

postponement_target_time.description: The time of day to snooze the alarm until.

postponement_time_period.description: One of AM, PM or UNKNOWN.

name: display_stopwatch_status
description: Opens the stopwatch app to show the state of the stopwatch.

name: find_and_display_alarms
description: Shows the matching alarms to the user.

alarm_search_query.description: Either the exact time or the label of the alarm.

filter_by_alarm_state.description: Type of the alarm to show (UPCOMING, DISABLED, ACTIVE).

filter_by_specific_date.description: The date to show alarms for.

filter_by_start_date_range.description: Filter for alarm scheduled to fire on or after this date.

filter_by_end_date_range.description: Filter for alarm scheduled to fire on or before this date.

name: find_and_display_timers
description: Shows the matching timers to the user.

timer_search_query.description: Either the duration, time_of_day, or the label of the timer.

filter_by_timer_state.description: Type of the timer to show (UPCOMING, PAUSED, RUNNING).

filter_by_timer_identifiers.description: The ids of the timers to be shown to the user.

name: postpone_ringing_alarm
description: Snoozes an alarm that is firing.

snooze_until_specific_time.description: The time to snooze until, in 12-hour format "H[:M[:S]]".

snooze_for_duration_in_seconds.description: Duration to snooze the alarm, in seconds.

name: schedule_new_alarm
description:
Create a new alarm.

This method can:
1) Create an alarm with a given duration. (For example, set an alarm for 15 minutes.)
2) Create an alarm at a specific time of the day. (For example, set an alarm at 10:30am.)

alarm_duration_text.description: Duration of the alarm, in the format such as e.g. 5h30m20s, 10m, 2m15s, etc.

alarm_time_of_day.description: Time of the day that the alarm should fire, in 12-hour format "H[:M[:S]]", e.g. "11:20".

alarm_scheduled_date.description: Scheduled date in format of YYYY-MM-DD.

alarm_weekly_recurrence.description: Should be one or more of SUNDAY, MONDAY, TUESDAY, etc.

name: set_alarm_activation_status
description: Changes an alarm's state or bulk changes all alarms' state.

select_alarms_by_current_state.description: Type of the alarm to be modified.

select_alarms_by_time.description: Time of the day of the alarm.

select_alarms_by_time_period.description: One of AM, PM or UNKNOWN.

requested_state_change.description: Operation to change the alarm state.

select_alarms_by_date.description: The date of the alarm to be modified.

select_alarms_after_date.description: Filter for alarm scheduled to fire on or after this date.

select_alarms_before_date.description: Filter for alarm scheduled to fire on or before this date.

apply_state_change_to_all.description: Whether to perform a bulk operation on all alarms.

name: set_time_based_event
description: Creates a clock object which can either be a timer or an alarm.

event_type.description: Type of the clock component. Either TIMER or ALARM.

event_duration_text.description: Duration of the timer or alarm.

event_trigger_time.description: Time of the day in HH:MM:SS format.

event_time_period_specifier.description: One of AM, PM, or UNKNOWN.

event_scheduled_date.description: Scheduled date in format of YYYY-MM-DD.

event_name.description: Label of the timer or alarm.

name: set_timer_run_status
description: Changes timers' state such as to resume, pause, reset, cancel, delete, stop, dismiss etc.

select_timers_by_duration.description: Duration of the timer that should be modified.

select_timers_by_label.description: The label of the timer that should be modified.

requested_timer_action.description: Operation to change the timer state.

apply_action_to_all_timers.description: Whether to perform a bulk operation on all timers.

name: update_alarms_with_filters
description: Modifies an alarm or multiple alarms' label, time, or state.

alarm_selection_criteria.description: Filters to identify the existing alarms that need to be modified.

properties_to_update.description: Modifications to make to the existing alarms.

apply_to_all_matching_alarms.description: Set to true ONLY when the user clearly wants to modify multiple alarms.

name: update_timers_with_filters
description: Modifies a timer or multiple timers' label, duration, or state.

timer_selection_criteria.description: Filters to identify the existing timers that need to be modified.

timer_attributes_to_change.description: Modifications to make to the existing timers.

apply_to_all_matching_timers.description: Only true when the user wants to perform a bulk operation on all timers.
